title: Ep. 478 - Everyone Lost The Debate
description:
With just 20 days to go before the Iowa caucuses, the Democrats faced off last night in Des Moines, Iowa, and everybody lost. That’s right, nobody won. Not Biden, not Bernie, not Warren, not Pete. Not the voters. Not the viewers. Every candidate did terribly. We will examine why and how that train wreck happened, and what it means for 2020. Then, House Democrats refuse to condemn Iran for attacking us, Vince Vaughn gets cancelled for shaking hands with the President, and Mike Bloomberg goes full Boomer.
